summary: Completed frontend testing of Supabase-based recruitment tracking system. Login page, form validation, authentication redirects, UI design, and responsiveness all working correctly. Cannot test authenticated features without valid user credentials.

integration_issues.issue: Minor Supabase error handling - 'body stream already read' message appears but doesn't break functionality

passed_tests: Login page loads correctly at /login route
Login form shows email and password inputs in Spanish
Form validation works for empty fields and invalid email format
Protected routes redirect unauthenticated users to /login
UI design with background image, card styling, and neutral gray theme
Form inputs are focusable and clickable on all device sizes
All UI components (shadcn/ui) are present and properly configured
action_item_for_main_agent: To complete testing, need valid Supabase user credentials to test: 1) Successful login and redirect to home page, 2) Home page with user email and roles display, 3) Role-based menu items and navigation, 4) Campaigns page functionality and CRUD operations, 5) Logout functionality. The app is well-built and ready for authenticated user testing.
